item.title: SignaturePad 2
item.description: Xamarin recently released version 2.0 of their SignaturePad control, and it’s great for capturing and displaying signatures in your Xamarin apps. There are NuGet packages for Xamarin projects and one specifically for Xamarin.Forms. I’ve implemented this recently and there are some gotchas you should be aware of: Default text If you don’t specify the text properties, you’ll end up with the following values as defaults: CaptionText = "Sign here." SignaturePromptText = "X" ClearLabelText = "Clear" If you don’t want any of these, remember to set the properties with an empty string.
